Package io.github.ljnelson.oci.secrets.configsource

package io.github.ljnelson.oci.secrets.configsource
Provides classes and interfaces related to implementing ConfigSources that return values from an OCI vault secret.
Author:
Laird Nelson
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ConfigurationBackedBuilderFunction
    A Function that, when supplied with a MicroProfile Config property name, returns a fully-configured GetSecretBundleRequest.Builder, or null if the property name is unsupported.
    SecretBundleConfigSource
    A ConfigSource implementation that returns certain MicroProfile Config property values from an OCI vault secret.
    SelectiveBuilderFunction
     
    SimpleSecretsSupplier
    A Supplier of Secrets instances.
